# Grand Plaza Hotel - Luxury Boutique Hotel in New York City

This website contains comprehensive information about Grand Plaza Hotel, a luxury boutique hotel located in the heart of Manhattan, New York City.

## About Grand Plaza Hotel
Grand Plaza Hotel is a 5-star luxury boutique hotel offering exceptional accommodations and personalized service. We are located in the prestigious Manhattan district, just steps from Central Park and Fifth Avenue shopping.

## Our Services & Amenities
- **Room Types**: Deluxe Rooms, Executive Suites, Presidential Suite, Penthouse Suite
- **Facilities**: Full-Service Spa, Rooftop Pool, Fitness Center, Fine Dining Restaurant, Business Center
- **Services**: 24/7 Concierge, Valet Parking, Room Service, Laundry Service, Airport Transfer
- **Technology**: High-Speed Wi-Fi, Smart Room Controls, Digital Concierge
- **Special Features**: Private Balconies, City Views, Premium Bedding, Marble Bathrooms

## Location & Accessibility
- **Address**: 123 Grand Plaza Avenue, Manhattan, New York, NY 10001
